00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * File defining checks for different Octeon features.
00044  *
00045  */
00046 
00047 #ifndef __OCTEON_FEATURE_H__
00048 #define __OCTEON_FEATURE_H__
00049 
00050 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00051 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00052 extern "C" {
00053 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 /*
00057  * Errors
00058  */
00059 typedef enum {
00060     OCTEON_FEATURE_SUCCESS = 0,
00061     OCTEON_FEATURE_MAP_OVERFLOW = -1,
00062 } octeon_feature_result_t;
00063 
00064 /*
00065  * Octeon attributes are per-core, initialized once, and referenced at
00066  * runtime. It provides a unified way to answer yes-or-no quetions.
00067  */
00068 typedef enum {
00069     OCTEON_ATTR_INIT_CORE,  /* initial core to run the app when booted */
00070     OCTEON_ATTR_TRACED, /* the core is traced */
00071     OCTEON_ATTR_NO_IOCFG,   /* skip IO config in cvmx_user_app_init() */
00072     OCTEON_ATTR_MAX
00073 } octeon_attr_t;
00074 #define OCTEON_IS_INIT_CORE()   octeon_has_attr(OCTEON_ATTR_INIT_CORE)
00075 #define OCTEON_IS_TRACED()  octeon_has_attr(OCTEON_ATTR_TRACED)
00076 #define OCTEON_IS_NO_IOCFG()    octeon_has_attr(OCTEON_ATTR_NO_IOCFG)
00077 
00078 /*
00079  * Octeon models are declared after the macros in octeon-model.h with the
00080  * suffix _FEATURE. The individual features are declared with the
00081  * _FEATURE_ infix.
00082  */
00083 typedef enum {
00084     /*
00085      * Checks on the critical path are moved to the top (8 positions)
00086      * so that the compiler generates one less insn than for the rest
00087      * of the checks.
00088      */
00089     OCTEON_FEATURE_PKND,
00090                 /**<  CN68XX uses port kinds for packet interface */
00091     OCTEON_FEATURE_CN68XX_WQE,
00092                 /**<  CN68XX has different fields in word0 - word2 */
00093 
00094     /*
00095      * Features
00096      */
00097     OCTEON_FEATURE_SAAD,
00098                 /**<  Octeon models in the CN5XXX family and higher support atomic add instructions to memory (saa/saad) */
00099     OCTEON_FEATURE_ZIP,
00100                 /**<  Does this Octeon support the ZIP offload engine? */
00101     OCTEON_FEATURE_CRYPTO,
00102                 /**<  Does this Octeon support crypto acceleration using COP2? */
00103     OCTEON_FEATURE_DORM_CRYPTO,
00104                 /**<  Can crypto be enabled by calling cvmx_crypto_dormant_enable()? */
00105     OCTEON_FEATURE_PCIE,
00106                 /**<  Does this Octeon support PCI express? */
00107     OCTEON_FEATURE_SRIO,
00108                 /**<  Does this Octeon support SRIO */
00109     OCTEON_FEATURE_ILK,
00110                 /**<  Does this Octeon support Interlaken */
00111     OCTEON_FEATURE_KEY_MEMORY,
00112                 /**<  Some Octeon models support internal memory for storing cryptographic keys */
00113     OCTEON_FEATURE_LED_CONTROLLER,
00114                    /**<  Octeon has a LED controller for banks of external LEDs */
00115     OCTEON_FEATURE_TRA,
00116                 /**<  Octeon has a trace buffer */
00117     OCTEON_FEATURE_MGMT_PORT,
00118                 /**<  Octeon has a management port */
00119     OCTEON_FEATURE_RAID,
00120                 /**<  Octeon has a raid unit */
00121     OCTEON_FEATURE_USB,
00122                 /**<  Octeon has a builtin USB */
00123     OCTEON_FEATURE_NO_WPTR,
00124                 /**<  Octeon IPD can run without using work queue entries */
00125     OCTEON_FEATURE_DFA,
00126                 /**<  Octeon has DFA state machines */
00127     OCTEON_FEATURE_MDIO_CLAUSE_45,
00128                        /**<  Octeon MDIO block supports clause 45 transactions for 10 Gig support */
00129     OCTEON_FEATURE_NPEI,
00130                 /**<  CN52XX and CN56XX used a block named NPEI for PCIe access. Newer chips replaced this with SLI+DPI */
00131     OCTEON_FEATURE_HFA,
00132                 /**<  Octeon has DFA/HFA */
00133     OCTEON_FEATURE_DFM,
00134                 /**<  Octeon has DFM */
00135     OCTEON_FEATURE_CIU2,
00136                 /**<  Octeon has CIU2 */
00137     OCTEON_FEATURE_DICI_MODE,
00138                 /**<  Octeon has DMA Instruction Completion Interrupt mode */
00139     OCTEON_FEATURE_BIT_EXTRACTOR,
00140                      /**<  Octeon has Bit Select Extractor schedulor */
00141     OCTEON_FEATURE_NAND,
00142                 /**<  Octeon has NAND */
00143     OCTEON_FEATURE_MMC,
00144                 /**<  Octeon has built-in MMC support */
00145     OCTEON_FEATURE_ROM,
00146                 /**<  Octeon has built-in ROM support */
00147     OCTEON_FEATURE_AUTHENTIK,
00148                 /**<  Octeon has Authentik ROM support */
00149     OCTEON_FEATURE_MULTICAST_TIMER,
00150                 /**<  Octeon has multi_cast timer */
00151     OCTEON_FEATURE_MULTINODE,
00152                 /**<  Octeon has node support */
00153     OCTEON_FEATURE_CIU3,
00154                 /**<  Octeon has CIU3 */
00155     OCTEON_FEATURE_FPA3,
00156                 /**<  Octeon has FPA first seen on 78XX */
00157     OCTEON_FEATURE_CN78XX_WQE,
00158                 /**<  CN78XX has different fields in word0 - word2 */
00159     OCTEON_FEATURE_PKO3,
00160                 /**< Octeon has enhanced PKO block */
00161     OCTEON_FEATURE_SPI,
00162                 /**< Octeon supports SPI interfaces */
00163     OCTEON_FEATURE_ZIP3,
00164                 /**<  Octeon has zip first seen on 78XX */
00165     OCTEON_FEATURE_BCH,
00166                 /**< Octeon supports BCH ECC */
00167     OCTEON_FEATURE_PKI,
00168                 /**< Octeon has PKI block */
00169     OCTEON_FEATURE_OCLA,
00170                 /**<  Octeon has OCLA */
00171     OCTEON_FEATURE_FAU,
00172                 /**<  Octeon has FAU */
00173     OCTEON_FEATURE_BGX,
00174                 /**<  Octeon has BGX */
00175     OCTEON_FEATURE_BGX_MIX,
00176                 /**<  On of the BGX is used for MIX */
00177     OCTEON_FEATURE_HNA,
00178                 /**<  Octeon has HNA */
00179     OCTEON_FEATURE_BGX_XCV,
00180                 /**< Octeon has BGX XCV RGMII support */
00181     OCTEON_FEATURE_TSO,
00182                 /**< Octeon has tcp segmentation offload */
00183     OCTEON_FEATURE_TDM,
00184                 /**< Octeon has PCM/TDM support */
00185     OCTEON_FEATURE_PTP,
00186                 /**< Octeon has PTP support */
00187     OCTEON_MAX_FEATURE
00188 } octeon_feature_t;
00189 
00190 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_SAAD(void)
00191 {
00192     return !OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN3XXX);
00193 }
00194 
00195 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_ZIP(void)
00196 {
00197     if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN30XX) || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN50XX)
00198          || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN52XX) || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF71XX)
00199          || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN70XX)
00200          || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX))
00201         return 0;
00202     else
00203         return !cvmx_fuse_read(121);
00204 }
00205 
00206 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_ZIP3(void)
00207 {
00208     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX)
00209          || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX));
00210 }
00211 
00212 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_BCH(void)
00213 {
00214     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN70XX)
00215         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)
00216         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX));
00217 }
00218 
00219 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_CRYPTO(void)
00220 {
00221     if (!OCTEON_IS_OCTEON1PLUS()) { /* OCTEON II and later */
00222         cvmx_mio_fus_dat2_t fus_2;
00223         fus_2.u64 = cvmx_read_csr(CVMX_MIO_FUS_DAT2);
00224         if (fus_2.s.nocrypto || fus_2.s.nomul) {
00225             return 0;
00226         } else if (!fus_2.s.dorm_crypto) {
00227             return 1;
00228         } else {
00229             cvmx_rnm_ctl_status_t st;
00230             st.u64 = cvmx_read_csr(CVMX_RNM_CTL_STATUS);
00231             return st.s.eer_val;
00232         }
00233     } else {
00234         return !cvmx_fuse_read(90);
00235     }
00236 }
00237 
00238 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_DORM_CRYPTO(void)
00239 {
00240     if (!OCTEON_IS_OCTEON1PLUS()) { /* OCTEON II and later */
00241         cvmx_mio_fus_dat2_t fus_2;
00242         fus_2.u64 = cvmx_read_csr(CVMX_MIO_FUS_DAT2);
00243         return !fus_2.s.nocrypto && !fus_2.s.nomul && fus_2.s.dorm_crypto;
00244     } else {
00245         return 0;
00246     }
00247 }
00248 
00249 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_PCIE(void)
00250 {
00251     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN56XX)
00252         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN52XX)
00253         || !OCTEON_IS_OCTEON1PLUS());   /* OCTEON II and later have PCIe */
00254 }
00255 
00256 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_SRIO(void)
00257 {
00258     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN63XX)
00259         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN66XX)
00260         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)
00261         );
00262 }
00263 
00264 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_ILK(void)
00265 {
00266     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN68XX) || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX));
00267 }
00268 
00269 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_KEY_MEMORY(void)
00270 {
00271     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN38XX)
00272         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN58XX)
00273         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN56XX)
00274         || !OCTEON_IS_OCTEON1PLUS());   /* OCTEON II or later */
00275 
00276 }
00277 
00278 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_LED_CONTROLLER(void)
00279 {
00280     return OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN38XX) || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN58XX)
00281            || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN56XX);
00282 }
00283 
00284 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_TRA(void)
00285 {
00286     return !(OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN30XX)
00287          || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN50XX)
00288          || OCTEON_IS_OCTEON3());
00289 }
00290 
00291 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_MGMT_PORT(void)
00292 {
00293     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN56XX)
00294         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN52XX)
00295         || OCTEON_IS_OCTEON2());    /* OCTEON II or later */
00296 }
00297 
00298 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_RAID(void)
00299 {
00300     return ((OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN56XX)
00301          || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN52XX)
00302          || OCTEON_IS_OCTEON2()
00303          || OCTEON_IS_OCTEON3())
00304         && !OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX));
00305 }
00306 
00307 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_USB(void)
00308 {
00309     return !(OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN38XX) || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN58XX));
00310 }
00311 
00312 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_NO_WPTR(void)
00313 {
00314     return ((OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN56XX)
00315          || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN52XX)
00316          || !OCTEON_IS_OCTEON1PLUS())   /* OCTEON II or later */
00317         && !OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN56XX_PASS1_X)
00318         && !OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN52XX_PASS1_X));
00319 }
00320 
00321 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_DFA(void)
00322 {
00323     if (!OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN38XX) && !OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN31XX)
00324         && !OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN58XX))
00325         return 0;
00326     else if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN3020))
00327         return 0;
00328     else
00329         return !cvmx_fuse_read(120);
00330 }
00331 
00332 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_HFA(void)
00333 {
00334     if (OCTEON_IS_OCTEON1PLUS() || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX))
00335         return 0;
00336     else
00337         return !cvmx_fuse_read(90);
00338 }
00339 
00340 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_HNA(void)
00341 {
00342     if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX) || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX))
00343         return !cvmx_fuse_read(134);
00344     else
00345         return 0;
00346 }
00347 
00348 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_DFM(void)
00349 {
00350     if (!(OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN63XX) || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN66XX)))
00351         return 0;
00352     else
00353         return !cvmx_fuse_read(90);
00354 }
00355 
00356 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_MDIO_CLAUSE_45(void)
00357 {
00358     return !(OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN3XXX) || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN58XX)
00359          || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN50XX));
00360 }
00361 
00362 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_NPEI(void)
00363 {
00364     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN56XX) || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN52XX));
00365 }
00366 
00367 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_PKND(void)
00368 {
00369     return OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN68XX)
00370         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)
00371         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX)
00372         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX);
00373 }
00374 
00375 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_CN68XX_WQE(void)
00376 {
00377     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN68XX));
00378 }
00379 
00380 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_CIU2(void)
00381 {
00382     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN68XX));
00383 }
00384 
00385 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_CIU3(void)
00386 {
00387     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX)
00388         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)
00389         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX));
00390 }
00391 
00392 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_FPA3(void)
00393 {
00394     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX)
00395         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)
00396         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX));
00397 }
00398 
00399 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_NAND(void)
00400 {
00401     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN52XX)
00402         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN63XX)
00403         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN66XX)
00404         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN68XX)
00405         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX)
00406         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)
00407         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN70XX));
00408 }
00409 
00410 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_DICI_MODE(void)
00411 {
00412     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN68XX_PASS2_X)
00413         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN61XX)
00414         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF71XX)
00415         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN70XX));
00416 }
00417 
00418 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_BIT_EXTRACTOR(void)
00419 {
00420     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN68XX_PASS2_X)
00421         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN61XX)
00422         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF71XX)
00423         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN70XX));
00424 }
00425 
00426 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_MMC(void)
00427 {
00428     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN61XX)
00429         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF71XX)
00430         || OCTEON_IS_OCTEON3());
00431 }
00432 
00433 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_ROM(void)
00434 {
00435     return OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN66XX)
00436            || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN61XX)
00437            || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF71XX);
00438 }
00439 
00440 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_AUTHENTIK(void)
00441 {
00442     if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN66XX)
00443         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN61XX)
00444         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF71XX)
00445         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN70XX)) {
00446         cvmx_mio_fus_dat2_t fus_2;
00447         fus_2.u64 = cvmx_read_csr(CVMX_MIO_FUS_DAT2);
00448         return (fus_2.s.nocrypto == 1) && (fus_2.s.dorm_crypto == 1);
00449     }
00450     return 0;
00451 }
00452 
00453 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_MULTICAST_TIMER(void)
00454 {
00455     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN66XX_PASS1_2)
00456         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN61XX)
00457         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF71XX)
00458         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN70XX));
00459 }
00460 
00461 
00462 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_MULTINODE(void)
00463 {
00464     return (!OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN76XX)
00465         && OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX));
00466 }
00467 
00468 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_CN78XX_WQE(void)
00469 {
00470     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX)
00471         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)
00472         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX));
00473 }
00474 
00475 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_SPI(void)
00476 {
00477     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN30XX)
00478         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN50XX)
00479         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN66XX)
00480         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN61XX)
00481         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF71XX)
00482         || OCTEON_IS_OCTEON3());
00483 }
00484 
00485 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_PKI(void)
00486 {
00487     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX)
00488         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)
00489         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX));
00490 }
00491 
00492 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_PKO3(void)
00493 {
00494     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX)
00495         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)
00496         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX));
00497 }
00498 
00499 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_OCLA(void)
00500 {
00501     return OCTEON_IS_OCTEON3();
00502 }
00503 
00504 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_FAU(void)
00505 {
00506     return (!OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX)
00507         && !OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)
00508         && !OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX));
00509 }
00510 
00511 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_BGX(void)
00512 {
00513     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX)
00514         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)
00515         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX));
00516 }
00517 
00518 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_BGX_MIX(void)
00519 {
00520     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX)
00521         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)
00522         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX));
00523 }
00524 
00525 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_BGX_XCV(void)
00526 {
00527     return OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX);
00528 }
00529 
00530 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_TSO(void)
00531 {
00532     return (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX)
00533         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)
00534         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX_PASS2_X));
00535 }
00536 
00537 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_TDM(void)
00538 {
00539     return OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN30XX)
00540         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN31XX)
00541         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN50XX)
00542         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN61XX)
00543         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF71XX)
00544         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN70XX);
00545 }
00546 
00547 static inline int octeon_has_feature_OCTEON_FEATURE_PTP(void)
00548 {
00549     return OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN6XXX)
00550         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF7XXX)
00551         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX)
00552         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)
00553         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX_PASS2_X);
00554 }
00555 
00556 /*
00557  * bit map for octeon features
00558  */
00559 #define FEATURE_MAP_SIZE    128
00560 CVMX_SHARED extern uint8_t octeon_feature_map[FEATURE_MAP_SIZE];
00561 
00562 /*
00563  * Answer ``Is the bit for feature set in the bitmap?''
00564  * @param feature
00565  * @return 1 when the feature is present and 0 otherwise, -1 in case of error.
00566  */
00567 #if defined(CVMX_BUILD_FOR_LINUX_HOST) || defined(CVMX_BUILD_FOR_TOOLCHAIN) || defined(__U_BOOT__)
00568 #define octeon_has_feature(feature_x) octeon_has_feature_##feature_x()
00569 #else
00570 #if defined(USE_RUNTIME_MODEL_CHECKS)
00571 static inline int octeon_has_feature(octeon_feature_t feature)
00572 {
00573     int byte, bit;
00574 
00575     byte = feature >> 3;
00576     bit = feature & 0x7;
00577     if (byte >= FEATURE_MAP_SIZE) {
00578 #ifdef CVMX_BUILD_FOR_LINUX_KERNEL
00579         printk("ERROR: octeon_feature_map: Invalid Octeon Feature 0x%x\n", feature);
00580 #else
00581         printf("ERROR: octeon_feature_map: Invalid Octeon Feature 0x%x\n", feature);
00582 #endif
00583         return -1;
00584     }
00585 
00586     return (octeon_feature_map[byte] & ((1 << bit))) ? 1 : 0;
00587 }
00588 #else
00589 #define octeon_has_feature(feature_x) octeon_has_feature_##feature_x()
00590 #endif
00591 #endif
00592 
00593 /*
00594  * initialize octeon_feature_map[]
00595  */
00596 extern void octeon_feature_init(void);
00597 
00598 /*
00599  * initialize octeon_attr_map[]
00600  */
00601 extern void octeon_attr_init(void);
00602 
00603 /*
00604  * Query attribute
00605  *
00606  * @param attr is the per-core attribute to query.
00607  * @return 1 if the core has the attribute, 0 if not, and -1 for error.
00608  */
00609 extern int octeon_has_attr(octeon_attr_t attr);
00610 
00611 /*
00612  * Set attribute
00613  *
00614  * @param attr is the per-core attribute.
00615  * @return 0 for success and -1 when attr is out of the defined range.
00616  */
00617 extern int octeon_set_attr(octeon_attr_t attr);
00618 
00619 /*
00620  * Clear attribute
00621  *
00622  * @param attr is the per-core attribute to clear.
00623  * @return 0 for success and -1 when attr is out of the defined range.
00624  */
00625 extern int octeon_clear_attr(octeon_attr_t attr);

00629 }
